name: Rainy Season
description:
The family was ready to visit the amusement park, but plans are cancelled due to weather.
This is a story about an ordinary family spending time at home during the rain.
"Rainy Season" is a narrative game that allows players to listen to the calming rain and engage in conversations with the family. The game is playable to finish in 40 minutes.
Interact with objectsTouch and interact with various items in the house to learn about them.
Talk to the familyDuring various times, listen and engage in conversations with the family with a branching dialogue system.
DaydreamsSpecial events will occur when bored.
